document_data.name: Anwae Mavin
document_data.mainbody: '''Anwae Mavin''' was a [[Half-dragon|half–]][[song dragon]] half–[[moon elf]] [[monk]] [[sorcerer]], and the leader of the [[Sisterhood of Essembra]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Background: She was the granddaughter of the song dragon [[Essembramaerytha]]. Anwae was interested in aiding [[metallic dragon]]s, [[dragonborn of Bahamut]], and other humanoids after the last [[Rage of Dragons]], in [[1373 DR]]. Although she knew that her support of the followers of Bahamut would draw the ire of the followers of [[Tiamat]], she continued helping them nonetheless.
